element-citation.article-title: Epidemic jungle fever among Okinawan colonists in the Bolivian rain forest
II. Isolation and characterization of Uruma virus, a newly recognized human pathogen

ref.mixed-citation: 15. SCHMIDT JR, GAJDUSEK DC, SCHAFFER M, GORRIE RH. Epidemic jungle fever among Okinawan colonists in the Bolivian rain forest. II. Isolation and characterization of Uruma virus, a newly recognized human pathogen. Am J Trop Med Hyg. 1959;8(4):479-87.
